Read  training dataset with freq

```{r}

load("tip_training_freq.RData")

tmp<-colSums(tip_training[,7:106])
barplot(tmp)
rm(tmp)
```


LM


```{r}
tip_training_lm<-tip_training[,6:106]
fit1<-lm(stars ~ ., data=tip_training_lm)
fit1_df<-as.data.frame(fit1[1])
summary.lm(fit1)
save(fit1_df, file="fit1_df.RData")
```

```{r}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(fit1)

```


```{r}
library(car)

```


```{r}
qqPlot(fit1, simulate=FALSE, main="Q-Q Plot")

```


```{r}
durbinWatsonTest(fit1)

```


```{r}
#crPlots(fit1)

```


```{r}
ncvTest(fit1)

```


```{r}
spreadLevelPlot(fit1)

```


```{r}
library(gvlma)
summary(gvlma(fit1))

```


```{r}

vif(fit1)
sqrt(vif(fit1))>2

```


```{r}
outlierTest(fit1)

```
